name: ImmunotherapyForAllergicRhinitis
title: Immunotherapy For Allergic Rhinitis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: To collect differnt value sets surrounding immunotherapy),(Data Element Scope: Procedure Performed or Recommended),(Inclusion Criteria: Immunotherapy),(Exclusion Criteria: Insect Immunotherapy)
